text: @atrupar @RepGrothman Didn't they say that COVID-19 just floats in the air for up to 16 hours? So whatever particles he didn't catch with his hand (which he spreads when he puts his hand down on the podium) are just floating there at the podium? TEST ALL THE SPEAKERS, at least.
